Class IMSApplication

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
emersonlebleu.c482_project.IMSApplication
public class IMSApplication extends javafx.application.Application
Class IMSApplication overarching class for our application. The class inherits from Application which is a starting point for JavaFX applications.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method. Entry point into the application. FUTURE ENHANCEMENT: For parts, they can be InHouse or Outsourced and each of those has an additional field either MachineId or Company Name. Currently, for Outsourced parts, because company name is a String input it is not incorrect for it to be a string of numbers "1234" for instance. It is however very unlikely that a company might be named only numbers, and it could easily get stored as such in error when one changes the type of the part from InHouse to Outsourced. In the future I would like to validate this with some regular expression or some criteria in the logic of the AddPart and ModifyPart controllers. For instance, a company name could start with a letter or number, must contain letters, can contain spaces or numbers as well, and can end with a letter or number.
